Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 3.4 Å (theoretical aperture size), ~4.0 Å (effective cutoff size for C3H6)

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, equimolar C3H6/C3H8 binary gas mixture
Other Information.Additional Info: The ZIF-8_Cm polymorph is the dominant phase, contributing to highly selective propylene sieving.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Room temperature, equimolar C3H6/C3H8 binary gas mixture
Other Information.Additional Info: Nonselective gaps between grain boundaries may allow minor propane permeation.

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: C3H6/C3H8 separation factor: 122 ± 13, C3H6 permeance: 54.5 ± 23.1 × 10^-10 mol m^-2 s^-1 Pa^-1

Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane exhibits excellent flexibility and maintains separation performance after bending with a curvature of 92 m^-1.
